com.labyrinth.game.modes

Class TreasureChase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.labyrinth.game.modes.TreasureChase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameMode

    public class TreasureChase
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameMode
    Represents the Treasure Chase game mode.
    Version:
    0.1.01042013
    Author:
    Gareth Gill, John Meikle

                throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Rotate the spare tile by a particular angle.
        Specified by:
        rotateTile in interface GameMode
        Parameters:

      • insertRow

        public Player insertRow(int row,
               Direction direc,
               Player performer)
                 throws IllegalMoveException
        Insert the spare tile into the specified row.
        Specified by:
        insertRow in interface GameMode
        Parameters:
        row - The row to insert the spare tile into.
        direc - The direction from which to insert the tile into.
        performer - The player who is performing the move.
        Returns:
        The newly updated player with increased score/moves and spare tile based on performer.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - When the move cannot be accomplished due to immovable tiles, etc.
